mapper.insert: insert into health_chat (who_chat, who_send, content, isRead) values (#{who_chat}, #{who_send}, #{content}, #{isRead})
mapper.select: select * from health_chat where who_chat = #{who_chat} order by idx
select who_chat from health_chat group by who_chat
select count(*) from health_chat where who_chat = #{who_chat} and who_send=#{who_send} and isRead=1
mapper.update: update health_chat set isRead = 0 where who_chat = #{who_chat} and who_send = #{who_send}
